title: Improve top slowest query
body:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18080164/203158219-6d4bc1ca-2e7e-453a-abbe-a82303b0dfcf.png)

This one appears to be the worst, `Removed_ID` were example real IDs from playground

```
SELECT count(*) AS count_1 
FROM (SELECT file.id AS file_id, file.created_time AS file_created_time, file.time_last_updated AS file_time_last_updated, file.count_instances_changed AS file_count_instances_changed, file.count_instances AS file_count_instances, file.created_by_kind AS file_created_by_kind, file.time_committed AS file_time_committed, file.job_id AS file_job_id, file.input_id AS file_input_id, file.member_created_id AS file_member_created_id, ..............
FROM file 
WHERE file.project_id = (Removed_ID) AND file.state != 'removed' AND file.parent_id IS NULL AND file.type IN ('video', 'image', 'compound') AND file.id IN (SELECT file_1.id 
FROM file AS file_1 JOIN workingdir_file_link ON workingdir_file_link.file_id = file.id 
WHERE workingdir_file_link.working_dir_id IN (Removed_ID))) AS anon_1
```

QueryID: In Azure insights
Specifics from:
`SELECT * FROM query_store.qs_view ORDER BY total_time DESC`
